message: I propose we split the money 3:2 in my favor, as I believe fairness should lean towards the proposer in the first round.
I propose a 55:45 split in my favor. This reflects the fact that I'm taking the risk of you rejecting this offer, while you get a chance to propose in the next round.
I propose an equal split, reflecting the principle of fairness. Both parties should benefit equally when there is no incentive to favor one over the other.
